price: Woi ne Amanehunu gya no a abͻneεfoͻ no faa no atorͻsεm no,
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
